nodes.text: At some point, the droids C-3PO and R2-D2 were part of a diplomatic mission to Circarpous. C-3PO commented on R2's eccentricities during the mission in a conversation with the Resistance pilot Jessika Pava sometime after the Battle of Endor.

The mission to Circarpous is mentioned in Jason Fry's 2015 canon young readers book The Weapon of a Jedi: A Luke Skywalker Adventure. It is an oblique reference to the events in the Star Wars Legends book Splinter of the Mind's Eye, the first Star Wars spinoff book, released in 1978 by Alan Dean Foster.[source?]
